text: Maine secretary of state targeted with ‘swatting call’ after ruling Trump ineligible for ballot  —  The incident happened just a day after Bellows, a Democrat, ruled former President Donald Trump is constitutionally ineligible to appear on the state's primary ballot next year.

Bankrupt ex-Mayor Rudy Giuliani regrets not having a NYC pension  —  Former Mayor Rudy Giuliani, who filed for bankruptcy in the wake of a $148 million civil court ruling and faces a mountain of unpaid legal bills, said he now regrets not having the safety net of a government pension.

Presidential candidate Haley cheers on Iowa hoops star Caitlin Clark in between campaign stops  —  IOWA CITY, Iowa (AP) — Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley finally got her wish to see Iowa basketball star Caitlin Clark, catching the fourth-ranked Hawkeyes in between campaign stops Saturday.

USA Boxing to allow transgender women to compete against female boxers under certain conditions from 2024 after introducing new policy  — USA Boxing has introduced a ‘Transgender Policy’ to its rule book for 2024  — Transgender boxers will be permitted to fight in the category of their choice

Biden's Crime Problem: Violent Crime is Down, but Voters Don't Believe it  —  Americans perceive crime as a major problem, even as data shows crime falling in most cities nationwide  —  Violent crime is dropping in most major American cities, but voters nationwide still think crime is on the rise.
